full_summary:
# Request for Proposal (RFP): Development of Photon Counting Spectral Detectors
===============

## Title
### English: _W7701-217344-B Development of photon counting spectral detectors_
### French: _W7701-217344-B Développement de détecteurs spectraux en comptage de photons_

## Reference Number
### WS3793402088-Doc3800920934

## Solicitation Number
### WS3793402088

## Contracting Entity
### Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)

## Procurement Category
### SRV (Service)

## Notice Type
### Request for Proposal (RFP)

## Procurement Method
### Competitive - Open bidding

## Selection Criteria
### Highest Combined Rating of Technical Merit and Price

## RFP Description
We invite proposals for the development of photon counting spectral detectors. This project requires the development of detectors with a large dynamic range that operate in photon counting mode for spectral LIDAR applications. The proposed service must be developed and delivered to our facility in Valcartier, Quebec, Canada.

## RFP Timeline
### Publication Date: January 9, 2023
### Tender Closing Date: February 20, 2023 (14:00 HNE)
### Amendment Date: February 14, 2023

## Contact Information
### Julie Desforges (SPAC/PSPC)
### Phone: None
### Email: [julie.desforges@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:julie.desforges@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)

## Tender Link
